Bash(git commit -m "fix: critical parser and analysis improvements

Fixed 3 critical issues identified in code review:

1. **Parser MemberExpression** - Store real index expression
   - Fixed: !arr[index] now stores actual index expr, not fake ''index''
   - Before: property = {type: ''Identifier'', name: ''index''}
   - After: property = indexExpr (real parsed expression)
   - Impact: Hovers, definitions, diagnostics now work on array indices

2. **ArrayIndexChecker** - Handle elseif correctly
   - Fixed: TypeError when elseif appears in code
   - ifStmt.alternate can be IfStatement (elseif) or Statement[] (else)
   - Added Array.isArray() check before iteration
   - Updated arr[0] detection to check Literal.value instead of property.name

3. **Document Validation** - Trigger on open/save
   - Added: documents.onDidOpen() - validate immediately when file opened
   - Added: documents.onDidSave() - revalidate on save
   - Before: diagnostics only appeared after first edit
   - After: diagnostics show immediately on open

All fixes tested and compiled successfully.")
